mapper.insert: insert into cart(cart_idx, user_idx, goods_idx, cart_img, cart_brand, cart_name, cart_pcs, cart_subPrice, cart_noname1, cart_noname2) values(cart_seq.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, #{param7}, #{param8}, #{para9})
mapper.update: update cart set cart_pcs=#{cart_pcs} where cart_idx = #{cart_idx}
mapper.select: select * from cart where user_idx = #{user_idx} and goods_idx = #{goods_idx}
